Feature Notes:
Monastic Tradition: 1 selection
Darkvision: R60' Sees one light level better
Discovery: Knows a unique and powerful truth
Ki: Can use 20 ki points per short rest
Speak With Small Beasts: Can communicate simple ideas with small animals
Timeless Body (Monk): Suffers no debility from aging and needs no food or water

Skill Notes:
Mystical Erudition: Skill Proficiency (Choose 3 from Arcana, History, Investigation, Nature, Religion)/Language (Choose 3 from any)
Actor: Has advantage on Deception and Performance to impersonate another person and can mimic others' speech or sounds
Tongue Of The Sun And Moon: Can communicate in any language
Combat
Hit Points: 115 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 13 Attacks Per Round: 2
Weapon Proficiency: Battleaxe; Morningstar; Pike; Shortsword; Simple Weapons
Armor: None Shield: Weapons: Light Hammer (+8 1d10+2 R20/60); Mace (+8 1d10+2); Sling (+12 1d10+6 R30/120); Unarmed (+8 1d10+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Martial Arts: When unarmored, gains +4 attack and damage with monk weapons and raises their damage dice to 1d10
Strength Attack Adjustment: -2
Strength Damage Adjustment: -2
Unarmored Defense (Monk): +1 Armor Class in no armor
Weapon Master: Weapon Proficiency (Choose 4 from any Simple Weapon, any Martial Weapon)
Debilitating Barrage: Can spend 3 ki points after an unarmed hit to inflict vulnerability or suppress resistance to a chosen damage type for 1 min or until the target suffers that type of damage
Deflect Missiles: Can use a reaction to reduce missile damage by 1d10+22 HP; reducing it to 0 hit points allows spending 1 ki point to make an immediate attack
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Extort Truth: Can spend 1 ki point after an unarmed hit to prevent the target from lying, and to give advantage on Charisma checks vs. it, (save Charisma negates) for 10 min
Extract Aspects: Flurry Of Blows hits reveal the target's condition immunities and damage vulnerabilities, resistance, and immunities and, until the next rest, allow responding to missed attacks on self by the target by using a reaction for an unarmed attack
Flurry Of Blows: Can spend 1 ki point to make 2 unarmed strikes as a bonus action
Ki-Empowered Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magical
Martial Arts: When unarmored, can use a bonus action to make an unarmed strike after a monk weapon attack
Mind Of Mercury: Can spend 1 ki point to gain an extra reaction once per rd
Patient Defense: Can spend 1 ki point to Dodge as a bonus action
Perfect Self: Has a minimum of 4 ki points available after initiative
Small: Has disadvantage on attacks with heavy weapons
Step Of The Wind: Can spend 1 ki point to double jump distance and to Disengage or Dash as a bonus action
Stunning Strike: Can spend 1 ki point after a successful attack to stun the target (save DC 15 Constitution negates) for 1 rd
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Constitution; Dexterity; Intelligence; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 7; Constitution: 8; Dexterity: 8; Intelligence: 9; Strength: 4; Wisdom: 7
Save Notes:
Diamond Soul: Proficient on all saves
Diamond Soul: Can spend 1 ki point to reroll a save
Evasion: Successful Dexterity saves yield no damage instead of half, and failures yield half damage
Gnome Cunning: Has advantage on Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom vs. magic
Purity Of Body: Has immunity to disease and poison
Stillness Of Mind: Can use an action to end charm or fright affecting self
Magic
Attack: Forest Gnome: 9; Monk: 7 Spell DC: Forest Gnome: 17; Monk: 15
Spells:
Astral Projection (Monk9 [Empty Body] Necr): R10' Self and 8 willing targets project to astral plane
Minor Illusion (Forest Gnome0 [Natural Illusionist] Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Elemental Adept (Acid): Spells that inflict acid damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Spells that inflict lightning damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Empty Body: Can spend 4 ki points to become invisible and gain resistance to all damage other than force for 1 min/Can spend 8 ki points to cast Astral Projection on self
Natural Illusionist: Knows the Minor Illusion cantrip
